about_the_game:
This music collection focuses on a horn section (trumpets, saxophones, etc.), infused with jazz and hip-hop sounds.

The set includes up-tempo tracks designed for battle scenes. However, these tracks can also be creatively used in other scenes, such as action or event sequences!

 

These sounds offer a modern twist, different from traditional fantasy music, making them especially recommended for those looking to add something unique to their RPGs.

 

Composer/Arranger: Takayuki Amanuma
Illustration: Masaya Nagaura

 

Included Tracks:

  • I”ll Kill You. (Standard Battle)

  • Street Battle (Standard Battle)

  • Groovy Gun Fight (Standard Battle)

  • Shadow Step (Standard Battle)

  • Revenge (Mid-Boss Battle)

  • Duel (Mid-Boss Battle)

  • Black Rain Falls (Mid-Boss Battle)

  • Backfire (Mid-Boss Battle)

  • Crime and Punishment (Final Boss Battle)

  • The Rebels (Final Boss Battle)

  • Crimson Dawn (Final Boss Battle)

  • Overture of Collapse (Final Boss Battle)

  • Victory (Battle End ME)

  • Battle Result (Battle End ME)

-------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

This music collection focuses on a horn section (trumpets, saxophones, etc.), infused with jazz and hip-hop sounds.

The set includes up-tempo tracks designed for battle scenes. However, these tracks can also be creatively used in other scenes, such as action or event sequences!

 

These sounds offer a modern twist, different from traditional fantasy music, making them especially recommended for those looking to add something unique to their RPGs.

 

Composer/Arranger: Takayuki Amanuma
Illustration: Masaya Nagaura

 

Included Tracks:
